metadata.name: Japan Briefing
metadata.description: Daily news briefing for the NYT Tokyo Bureau Chief

all.headline: 各地で気温上昇 落雪や雪崩 除雪中の事故など十分注意
all.description: 立春の4日は広い範囲で気温が上がっています。平年を上回る積雪となっている地域では、屋根からの落雪や雪崩、除雪作業中の事故などに十分注意をしてください。

all.headline: 安倍元首相銃撃事件 山上被告の弁護団が控訴 判決不服として
all.description: 4年前、奈良市で安倍元総理大臣を銃撃したとして殺人などの罪に問われ、無期懲役の判決を言い渡された山上徹也被告の弁護団が4日、判決を不服として控訴しました。

all.headline: プルデンシャル生命 新規契約の販売活動を90日間自粛
all.description: 営業社員が顧客から金銭をだまし取るなど31億円にのぼる不適切な金銭の受領が判明したプルデンシャル生命は、2月9日から新規契約の販売活動を90日間、自粛すると発表しました。ガバナンス態勢や営業制度の抜本的な見直しを最優先に実施するためだとしています。

all.headline: 米軍 “アラビア海の空母に接近のイラン無人機を撃墜”
all.description: アメリカ軍はアラビア海に展開する空母に接近したイランの無人機を撃墜したと明らかにしました。アメリカとイランは高官による協議を控えており、ホワイトハウスは現時点では予定どおり行われる見通しを示していますが、高官協議が実現し、緊張緩和につながるかが焦点です。

all.headline: 退職代行事件 労組の賛助金名目で紹介料支払いも 実態なしか
all.description: 退職代行サービス、「モームリ」を運営する会社の社長ら2人が、依頼者を弁護士に紹介して違法に紹介料を得ていたとして弁護士法違反の疑いで逮捕された事件で、弁護士側からの紹介料は提携する労働組合への賛助金の名目で支払われていましたが、組合費が集められていなかったことなどから、警視庁は、組合には実態がなかったとみて詳しく調べています。2人はいずれも容疑を否認しているということです。

all.headline: 月探査 アルテミス計画 ロケット打ち上げ延期へ 燃料漏れ確認
all.description: 宇宙飛行士による月の探査を目指す国際的なプロジェクト「アルテミス計画」で、NASA＝アメリカ航空宇宙局は早ければ8日に予定していたロケットの打ち上げを来月以降に延期すると発表しました。最終試験で燃料漏れが確認されたとしています。

all.headline: クリントン元大統領夫妻 エプスタイン氏めぐり証言に同意
all.description: アメリカで性的虐待などの罪で起訴され、その後、死亡した富豪 エプスタイン氏をめぐり、アメリカ議会下院の委員会はクリントン元大統領夫妻が2月下旬に証言することに同意したと発表しました。

all.headline: Clippers trade Harden to Cavaliers for Garland as deadline nears
all.description: News of the Harden deal came amid a flurry of reported moves on Tuesday.

all.headline: Refiner Eneos to expand oil-trading portfolio outside of Japan
all.description: Eneos beefing up its trading presence is part of a broader push to create more value across business sectors as oil markets kicked off the year with a high level of volatility.

all.headline: LDP executive seeks to leave slush fund scandal behind
all.description: Koichi Hagiuda was among the five leading figures of the now-defunct LDP faction once led by the late Prime Minister Shinzo Abe, which was at the center of the scandal.

all.headline: Thai-born goalkeeper shines in national high school soccer tournament
all.description: Marking his school's maiden appearance in the championship match, Poomraphee Siribunyakul repeatedly produced crucial saves, including a first-half penalty stop.

all.headline: Japan coach Jones says 'fair' Rugby World Cup schedule helps small teams
all.description: The Brave Blossoms have been drawn in a pool with France, Samoa and the United States for next year's World Cup.

all.headline: Assassin of Shinzo Abe files appeal against life sentence
all.description: Tetsuya Yamagami reportedly agreed to appeal after strong persuasion from his lawyers.

all.headline: How Sanae Takaichi won over disillusioned young voters
all.description: So far, the prime minister's strategy of presenting herself as different from previous leaders seems to have struck a chord with Japan’s youth.

all.headline: EU must be ‘less naive’ in COP climate talks: French ecology ministry
all.description: Last November’s U.N. climate summit ended with a watered-down pact that omitted EU demands over fossil fuels.

all.headline: Chinese families ache for sons stolen in one-child era
all.description: When China had its one-child policy, the trafficking of young boys was fueled by parents seeking a son to carry on the family line, experts say.

all.headline: Social media groups face European backlash as Spain and Greece weigh teen bans
all.description: They join countries such as ‍Britain and ⁠France in considering tougher stances on social media.

all.headline: New York, New Jersey Sue Trump Administration over Tunnel Funding Halt
all.description: WASHINGTON, Feb 3 - New York and New Jersey late on Tuesday sued the Trump administration seeking an emergency court order to force the restoration of funding for the massive $16 billion Hudson River

all.headline: 90-Year-Old Mother of Abductee Laments Lack of Progress
all.description: Kawasaki, Kanagawa Pref., Feb. 4 (Jiji Press)—The mother of Megumi Yokota, a Japanese national abducted by North Korea decades ago, turned 90 on Wednesday, lamenting the lack of progress in fulfilling

all.headline: Hunting for Small Details in PokéPark KANTO, Keep a Sharp Eye Out at All Times
all.description: PokéPark KANTO’s creation certainly involved a great deal of care and attention to detail, as little nods to series can be found everywhere.

all.headline: US Shoots down Iranian Drone Approaching Aircraft Carrier, Official Says
all.description: Feb 3 (Reuters) - The U.S. military on Tuesday shot down an Iranian drone that "aggressively" approached the Abraham Lincoln aircraft carrier in the Arabian Sea, the U.S. military said, in an incident

all.headline: Green Tea Exports Hit Record High in 2025 Amid Growing Demand, Likely to Be Driving Force Behind Govt Export Target
all.description: Exports of green tea, including matcha, reached a record high of more than 10,000 tons last year, according to trade statistics released by the Finance Ministry.

all.description: WASHINGTON (Reuters) — Using observations from the James Webb Space Telescope in a patch of the sky covering almost three times the area of the full moon, scientists have created the most detailed cos

all.headline: Tokyo Had 65,000 More People Move In Than Out In 2025; Osaka Area Also Saw Gains
all.description: Tokyo had a net migration gain of 65,219 people in 2025, but the margin declined by 14,066 people from the previous year, marking the first decline in four years, according to a government report rele

all.description: NEW YORK (AP) — As the new robot called Sprout walks around a Manhattan office, nodding its rectangular head, lifting its windshield wiper-like “eyebrows” and offering to shake your hand with its grip

'Never imagined this': Indian village grapples with interfaith couple's killing
all.description: Police say they were beaten to death, allegedly by the woman's three brothers, who have been arrested.

all.headline: 'I don't think I am a hero': Boy, 13, describes 'superhuman' swim to save family
all.description: Austin Applebee recounts his 'superhuman' swim which saved the lives of his mother and siblings in Australia.

all.headline: The Chinese planemaker taking on Boeing and Airbus
all.description: Comac's passenger jet is attracting customers in South East Asia where demand for affordable aircraft is growing.

all.headline: Hope and uncertainty as India and US strike long-delayed trade deal
all.description: Indian industry has welcomed lower tariffs, but experts caution against celebration until details are clearer.

all.headline: No defect found in switch of jet grounded by Air India - regulator
all.description: The Boeing 787-8 jet was grounded after a pilot reported a possible issue with the fuel control switch.

all.headline: US and India reach trade deal, Trump says after Modi call
all.description: Tariffs will drop from 50% to 18% on Indian goods, while India has agreed to stop buying Russian oil.

all.headline: China bans hidden car door handles over safety concerns
all.description: It makes China the first country to stop the use of designs first made popular by Elon Musk's Tesla.

all.headline: 'Superhuman' teen swims hours to save family stranded off Australian coast
all.description: The 13-year-old swam 4km in rough water after his mother and siblings were swept out to sea off the coast of Western Australia.

all.headline: Beijing criticises Dalai Lama Grammy win as 'manipulation'
all.description: The Buddhist spiritual leader is recognised in the audiobook category for his meditations.

all.headline: KPop Demon Hunters' Golden becomes first K-pop song to win Grammy
all.description: The Cure, Yungblud and FKA Twigs are the first British winners on the night in Los Angeles.

all.headline: How Indonesia's new sex laws will affect tourists
all.description: International travelers have been flocking back to the popular resort island of Bali as the Covid pandemic subsides, prompting hopes that Indonesia's battered tourism industry is on the road to recove

all.headline: Afghanistan
North Korea
This 'edible' plastic bag alternative could save Nara's sacred deer
all.description: A local entrepreneur in the Japanese tourist destination of Nara has developed an alternative to plastic shopping bags, to protect the town's sacred deer.

all.headline: The battle to save Sri Lanka's leopards
all.description: Having endured a bloody civil war from 1983 until 2009, Sri Lanka is now at peace and developing rapidly. That's good news for the country as a whole, but the island nation's leopards are under threat

all.headline: Wildlife is flourishing around Fukushima
all.description: Nearly a decade after Japan's Fukushima nuclear disaster, researchers have discovered that wildlife is thriving in the areas evacuated by humans, despite radiological contamination.

all.headline: China debuts 620 kph train prototype
all.description: China has revealed a prototype for a new high-speed Maglev train that is capable of reaching speeds of 620 kilometers (385 miles) per hour.

all.headline: A Shanghai building 'walks' to a new location
all.description: Shanghai residents passing through the city's eastern Huangpu district in October might have stumbled upon an unusual sight: a "walking" building.

all.headline: Self-driving robotaxis are taking off in China
all.description: The world has been inching toward fully autonomous cars for years. In China, one company just got even closer to making it a reality.

all.headline: Travel to Japan during Covid-19: What you need to know
all.description: If you're planning a trip to Japan, here's what you'll need to know and expect if you want to visit during the global coronavirus pandemic.

primary.headline: 各地で気温上昇 落雪や雪崩 除雪中の事故など十分注意
primary.description: 立春の4日は広い範囲で気温が上がっています。平年を上回る積雪となっている地域では、屋根からの落雪や雪崩、除雪作業中の事故などに十分注意をしてください。

primary.headline: 安倍元首相銃撃事件 山上被告の弁護団が控訴 判決不服として
primary.description: 4年前、奈良市で安倍元総理大臣を銃撃したとして殺人などの罪に問われ、無期懲役の判決を言い渡された山上徹也被告の弁護団が4日、判決を不服として控訴しました。

primary.headline: プルデンシャル生命 新規契約の販売活動を90日間自粛
primary.description: 営業社員が顧客から金銭をだまし取るなど31億円にのぼる不適切な金銭の受領が判明したプルデンシャル生命は、2月9日から新規契約の販売活動を90日間、自粛すると発表しました。ガバナンス態勢や営業制度の抜本的な見直しを最優先に実施するためだとしています。

primary.headline: 米軍 “アラビア海の空母に接近のイラン無人機を撃墜”
primary.description: アメリカ軍はアラビア海に展開する空母に接近したイランの無人機を撃墜したと明らかにしました。アメリカとイランは高官による協議を控えており、ホワイトハウスは現時点では予定どおり行われる見通しを示していますが、高官協議が実現し、緊張緩和につながるかが焦点です。

primary.headline: 退職代行事件 労組の賛助金名目で紹介料支払いも 実態なしか
primary.description: 退職代行サービス、「モームリ」を運営する会社の社長ら2人が、依頼者を弁護士に紹介して違法に紹介料を得ていたとして弁護士法違反の疑いで逮捕された事件で、弁護士側からの紹介料は提携する労働組合への賛助金の名目で支払われていましたが、組合費が集められていなかったことなどから、警視庁は、組合には実態がなかったとみて詳しく調べています。2人はいずれも容疑を否認しているということです。

primary.headline: 月探査 アルテミス計画 ロケット打ち上げ延期へ 燃料漏れ確認
primary.description: 宇宙飛行士による月の探査を目指す国際的なプロジェクト「アルテミス計画」で、NASA＝アメリカ航空宇宙局は早ければ8日に予定していたロケットの打ち上げを来月以降に延期すると発表しました。最終試験で燃料漏れが確認されたとしています。

primary.headline: クリントン元大統領夫妻 エプスタイン氏めぐり証言に同意
primary.description: アメリカで性的虐待などの罪で起訴され、その後、死亡した富豪 エプスタイン氏をめぐり、アメリカ議会下院の委員会はクリントン元大統領夫妻が2月下旬に証言することに同意したと発表しました。

primary.description: News of the Harden deal came amid a flurry of reported moves on Tuesday.

primary.headline: Refiner Eneos to expand oil-trading portfolio outside of Japan
primary.description: Eneos beefing up its trading presence is part of a broader push to create more value across business sectors as oil markets kicked off the year with a high level of volatility.

primary.headline: LDP executive seeks to leave slush fund scandal behind

primary.headline: Thai-born goalkeeper shines in national high school soccer tournament
primary.description: Marking his school's maiden appearance in the championship match, Poomraphee Siribunyakul repeatedly produced crucial saves, including a first-half penalty stop.
